Observed at: Elk Island National Park 10:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
